CM2UTH MARCH. 1949CABINETCHINA AND SOUTH EAST ASIA COMMITTEE -COMPOSITION AND TERMS OF REFERENCE"Note by the Secretary of the CabinetFollowing upon the Cabinet's discussionof 8th March (CM. (1+9) 18th Conclusions, Minute 2)the Prime Minister has appointed a ministerial committee to consider the problems of china andSouth East Asia.2. The Committee will be composed as follows:-Prime Minister (Chairman)Secretary of State for Foreign AffairsChancellor of the ExchequerMinister of defence secretary of State for the ColoniesSecretary of State for commonwealth relations.3. The terms of reference of the Committee will be:-"To consider such major questions of policyconcerning China and South East Asia asmay be referred to it.114* The Secretaries will be Mr. S.E.V. Luke andMr. C.A.L. Cliffe, Cabinet Office.(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.W.I.,24th March, 1949-
